Script.EP1: （シンゾウ）おっ こんにちは あれ？
Meaning.EP1: Hello. Huh?

Script.EP1: （ナレーション）商店街から― 一本入った路地にある その居酒屋には…
Meaning.EP1: In the alley next to the shopping street is a Japanese izakaya-style pub…

Script.EP1: （ヒロシ） どうも ありがとうございました
Meaning.EP1: Thank you.

Script.EP1: （ナレーション） 物騒な名前が入った のれんが掛けられている
Meaning.EP1: …that has an unsettling name on its shop curtain.

Script.EP1: しかし 勇気を持ってくぐった者は 気づくだろう
Meaning.EP1: However, those who have the courage to enter will come to realize

Script.EP1: うまい酒とおいしい料理
Meaning.EP1: that this place has good drinks and good food.

Script.EP1: そして優しい人たちが ここにいることを… そして優しい人たちが ここにいることを… （馨(かおる)）あっ いらっしゃい そして優しい人たちが ここにいることを…
Meaning.EP1: -And the company of warm-hearted people. -Welcome.

Script.EP1: （美音(みね)）いらっしゃい
Meaning.EP1: Welcome.

Script.EP1: （馨）あっ じゃあ カウンターどうぞ
Meaning.EP1: Have a seat at the counter.

Script.EP1: （ウメ）どうぞ
Meaning.EP1: -Please come in. -Just a moment.

Script.EP1: （馨）はい コート お預かりしますね
Meaning.EP1: I'll take your coat.

Script.EP1: （美音）この店の店主だった父は よく言っていた
Meaning.EP1: My father who used to own this pub would often say…

Script.EP1: （健吾）どこの家庭でも 出てくるような料理で―
Meaning.EP1: We serve food that can be found in any household,

Script.EP1: 金取ってる うちの店は もう それだけでぼったくりだ
Meaning.EP1: We serve food that can be found in any household, and that in itself makes us a rip-off, a bottakuri.

Script.EP1: でもな 美音 たとえ ありきたりの料理でもな
Meaning.EP1: But Mine, even though they may be common recipes,

Script.EP1: 一つ一つ丁寧に心込めて作んだ
Meaning.EP1: cook every single dish with all your heart.

Script.EP1: 料理食べた人が 思わず笑みを浮かべるような一皿
Meaning.EP1: A dish that unexpectedly brings smiles to people's faces…

Script.EP1: それができて初めて―
Meaning.EP1: Once you can make that,

Script.EP1: 払った金 惜しくねえって 客が思ってくれるようになんだ
Meaning.EP1: our customers will not regret the money they spend.

Script.EP1: でも まだ父さんは そこまでじゃない
Meaning.EP1: But I haven't reached that point yet.

Script.EP1: だから この店の名前は “ぼったくり”でいいんだよ
Meaning.EP1: That's why Bottakuri is the right name for this place.

Script.EP1: （トク）美音坊 一番高い酒くれ！
Meaning.EP1: Mine-bo, pour me your best sake!

Script.EP1: トクさん いらっしゃい
Meaning.EP1: Welcome, Toku.

Script.EP1: （馨）いらっしゃい カウンターどうぞ
Meaning.EP1: Welcome. Have a seat at the counter.

Script.EP1: おいおい おいおい 殴り込みじゃねえんだからさ 現場で何かあったのかい？
Meaning.EP1: Hey now, don't come in throwing fists. Did something happen at work?

Script.EP1: （トク）あ？ （シンゾウ）“あ？”じゃないよ
Meaning.EP1: Huh? Don't give me that. You really look like you could blow off some stream.

Script.EP1: 何だよ 憂さ晴らししたくて しょうがねえって顔してるよ
Meaning.EP1: Don't give me that. You really look like you could blow off some stream.

Script.EP1: （美音）じゃあ “ぼったくり”の 名にふさわしく― 一番高いお酒で ぱーっと…
Meaning.EP1: Well then, true to our Bottakuri namesake, I shall get you the most expensive drink…

Script.EP1: と言いたいところですが
Meaning.EP1: Is what I would like to say but…

Script.EP1: 何だ 美音坊 “言いたいところですが”ってよ
Meaning.EP1: Why do you have to say it like that, Mine-bo?

Script.EP1: 今日のおすすめには 違うお酒のほうが合いそうなんです
Meaning.EP1: I believe a different drink will pair better with today's special.

Script.EP1: おっ おでんか
Meaning.EP1: Oh, it's oden.

Script.EP1: ああ 今日は寒の戻りって 感じだから いいかもね
Meaning.EP1: It got cold all of a sudden again so that sounds good.

Script.EP1: うん 熱いおでんを 頂こうじゃねえの
Meaning.EP1: Yes, I'll have the hot oden please.

Script.EP1: （美音）はい （シンゾウ）はい 俺も
Meaning.EP1: -Sure. -Me, too.

Script.EP1: はい じゃあ お酒はどうします？
Meaning.EP1: Yes. What are you drinking?

Script.EP1: 美音坊に お任せだ
Meaning.EP1: I'll leave it up to you.

Script.EP1: 分かりました
Meaning.EP1: Okay.

Script.EP1: （シンゾウ）来ましたよっと
Meaning.EP1: Here it is.

Script.EP1: （馨）おでんもどうぞ （トク）おおっ
Meaning.EP1: -Here is your oden. -Whoa.

Script.EP1: （トク）おお これ… うまそうじゃねえかよ え？
Meaning.EP1: Oh wow, it looks so good. Wow.

Script.EP1: （シンゾウ）はいはい じゃあ はい いただきやす
Meaning.EP1: Okay then, let's dig in.

Script.EP1: おいおい トクさん トクさん おい まずは乾杯じゃねえのかよ おい
Meaning.EP1: Hey, Toku. What about our toast?

Script.EP1: でもよ この分厚い大根が どうにもこうにも― 食ってくれってよお
Meaning.EP1: But this plump daikon radish is just begging me to eat it.

Script.EP1: 一口だけ お先
Meaning.EP1: Let me have one bite.

Script.EP1: （馨）ありがとうございました
Meaning.EP1: Thank you very much.

Script.EP1: 飲みやがった この野郎 （美音）ウフフ…
Meaning.EP1: This bastard took a sip.

Script.EP1: 人が せっかく待ってんのに
Meaning.EP1: And here I was waiting for you!

Script.EP1: アハッ すまねえ シンさん
Meaning.EP1: I'm sorry, Shin!

Script.EP1: しょうがねえな このおやじ
Meaning.EP1: This old man can't be helped.

Script.EP1: この酒は…
Meaning.EP1: This sake is…

Script.EP1: 分かりますか？
Meaning.EP1: Do you know what it is?

Script.EP1: うん
Meaning.EP1: Yes…

Script.EP1: ちゃんと米の香りが残っているのに 重さがないね
Meaning.EP1: It has a proper aroma of rice but the taste is light.

Script.EP1: で この熟成のうまみと― 後切れもさっぱり
Meaning.EP1: And it has a mature flavor as well as a refreshing aftertaste.

Script.EP1: うん…
Meaning.EP1: Yeah.

Script.EP1: おっ またシンさんの勝ちかい？
Meaning.EP1: Oh? Has Shin won again?

Script.EP1: まだ分かりませんってば
Meaning.EP1: We don't know yet.

Script.EP1: お姉ちゃん 諦めなよ シンゾウさんには かなわないって
Meaning.EP1: Let it go, Sis. You can't beat Shinzo.

Script.EP1: 俺はね 美音坊が生まれるずっと前から 酒 飲んでんだよ
Meaning.EP1: I've been drinking sake since years before Mine-bo was born.

Script.EP1: あれこれ知ってて当然ですよ
Meaning.EP1: Of course I know a lot of things.

Script.EP1: （美音）そりゃあ そうでしょうけど…
Meaning.EP1: That may be true, but…

Script.EP1: まあ 年寄りに花持たしてやりなよ
Meaning.EP1: Let the old man have his glory.

Script.EP1: で シンさん 今日の酒は？
Meaning.EP1: So Shin, what is it?

Script.EP1: ずばり… “諏訪泉(すわいずみ)”
Meaning.EP1: I've got to say it's Suwaizumi.

Script.EP1: ねっ しかも この―
Meaning.EP1: Right? Moreover, considering this mild flavor which enriches the taste of the dishes…

Script.EP1: 優しい口当たりで 料理を引き立てるところを見ると…
Meaning.EP1: Moreover, considering this mild flavor which enriches the taste of the dishes…

Script.EP1: “満天星(まんてんせい)”
Meaning.EP1: I'd say it's Mantensei.

Script.EP1: どうだ！
Meaning.EP1: How did I do?

Script.EP1: 正解
Meaning.EP1: You got it right.

Script.EP1: （シンゾウ）ほら （客）さすがですね
Meaning.EP1: You're amazing.

Script.EP1: （美音）鳥取県にある 諏訪酒造のお酒です
Meaning.EP1: It is from the Suwa sake brewer in Tottori Prefecture.

Script.EP1: （シンゾウ）これこれ これこれこれ 満天星 （馨）何で分かんの？
Meaning.EP1: -Yes, this! Mantensei. -How did you know?

Script.EP1: そのお酒 今日 初めて出すんだよ
Meaning.EP1: -Hm? -It's our first time serving it.

Script.EP1: （シンゾウ）そうだよ まあ 大概 その… 色だよ
Meaning.EP1: I know, but you can generally tell by the color.

Script.EP1: ね？　味 香り この３つ そろえば 見当はつくんだよ
Meaning.EP1: Flavor, aroma and color are the three things to go by.

Script.EP1: ね？　まずはね この…
Meaning.EP1: Flavor, aroma and color are the three things to go by. -First of all, look here. At this color. -It is different.

Script.EP1: これこれ （客）ああ… この色だよ これ （客）変わってますよね
Meaning.EP1: -First of all, look here. At this color. -It is different.

Script.EP1: （トク）色？ （シンゾウ）これ！
Meaning.EP1: -Color? -Look.

Script.EP1: （トク）おお 黄色いな この酒
Meaning.EP1: Oh, it's yellow.

Script.EP1: これが酒本来の色なんだよ
Meaning.EP1: This is the true color of sake.

Script.EP1: （トク）ほお～
Meaning.EP1: Is that so?

Script.EP1: お酒の場合は やまぶき色って言うんですって
Meaning.EP1: In the case of sake, it's called yamabuki-iro.

Script.EP1: （トク）へえ （馨）やまぶき色？
Meaning.EP1: Really? Yamabuki-iro?

Script.EP1: やまぶき色って もっとすごく黄色くない？
Meaning.EP1: Isn't that a stronger yellow tone?

Script.EP1: （美音）うん 私もそう思って調べてみたの
Meaning.EP1: Yeah. I thought the same thing so I looked it up.

Script.EP1: 一番近い色は 密陀僧(みつだそう)って色だったんだけど
Meaning.EP1: The closest color was called mitsudasou.

Script.EP1: （馨）密陀僧？ そんな色 聞いたこともないわ
Meaning.EP1: Mitsudasou? I've never heard of it.

Script.EP1: だから 分かりやすく― やまぶき色って 言われてるんだと思うわよ
Meaning.EP1: That's probably why by it's called by the recognized color, yamabuki-iro.

Script.EP1: （馨）わざわざ色見本 調べるところとか― お姉ちゃんらしいというか めんどくさいというか…
Meaning.EP1: It's just like you to do something as tedious as look up color charts--

Script.EP1: うるさいわね 気になったら調べるでしょ
Meaning.EP1: Shut it. It's normal to look things up if you're interested in them.

Script.EP1: （馨）はいはい 私も勉強させていただいてます
Meaning.EP1: Yeah, sure. I learned something thanks to you.

Script.EP1: （シンゾウ）フフフ… なんてね
Meaning.EP1: I was just kidding.

Script.EP1: ラベルがちょこっと 見えちゃったんだよ
Meaning.EP1: I got a glimpse of the label.

Script.EP1: （美音）ずるい 反則じゃないですか
Meaning.EP1: How sneaky of you. That's cheating.

Script.EP1: （トク） 脇が甘いんだよ 美音坊は
Meaning.EP1: Your defense is weak, Mine-bo.

Script.EP1: （馨）引き分けってことだね
Meaning.EP1: It's a draw then.

Script.EP1: （トク）それにしても このおでん うめえな
Meaning.EP1: Either way, this oden is delicious.

Script.EP1: （シンゾウ）うん （トク）あれ？
Meaning.EP1: Huh?

Script.EP1: 美音坊 もしかして… あれ あるんだろ？
Meaning.EP1: Mine-bo. Do you have that thing?

Script.EP1: あれって？
Meaning.EP1: What thing?

Script.EP1: 意地悪なこと言うなよ みそ漬けだよ みそ漬け
Meaning.EP1: Don't be so mean. I'm talking about misozuke.

Script.EP1: フッ 目ざといなあ
Meaning.EP1: You have a sharp eye.

Script.EP1: 明日のおすすめにしようと 思ってたのに
Meaning.EP1: I was planning on making it tomorrow's special.

Script.EP1: 明日か… でも明日は予定があって 来られねえんだよ
Meaning.EP1: Tomorrow, huh? But I have plans and can't come tomorrow.

Script.EP1: ん～ 今日のうち 食わせてくれよ な？ 元気をつけときたいからさ
Meaning.EP1: Come on and let me have it today. I want to get some energy.

Script.EP1: いいじゃん 今日 トクさん 嫌なことあったみたいだし ねえ
Meaning.EP1: What's the big deal? It seems Toku had a rough day, right?

Script.EP1: （トク）うん （馨）出してあげれば？
Meaning.EP1: Let him have it.

Script.EP1: （美音）まだ 食べ頃じゃないかもしれないけど
Meaning.EP1: It might not be ready yet…

Script.EP1: 分かった 特別にお出しします
Meaning.EP1: Fine. I'll treat you to it.

Script.EP1: おお やった！
Meaning.EP1: That's the spirit.

Script.EP1: お待ちください （トク）はい
Meaning.EP1: -Please wait. -I will.

Script.EP1: （馨）はい （トク）おっ はいはい はいはい
Meaning.EP1: -Here you go. -Oh! -This is it. -Egg yolk misozuke.

Script.EP1: （馨）卵黄のみそ漬けね
Meaning.EP1: -This is it. -Egg yolk misozuke.

Script.EP1: （シンゾウ）う… うまそうだな
Meaning.EP1: Th-That looks good.

Script.EP1: （トク）何だよ 自分だって そのザマかい
Meaning.EP1: What? You can't resist it, either?

Script.EP1: （馨）はーい フライング お二人目！
Meaning.EP1: And another one jumps the gun!

Script.EP1: すまねえ
Meaning.EP1: Sorry.

Script.EP1: シンゾウさん 卵黄のみそ漬けね （シンゾウ）おわびついでに―
Meaning.EP1: -One for Shinzo. -Thank you.

Script.EP1: 酒 もう１杯頼むよ 美音坊
Meaning.EP1: -I'll order another drink as thanks. -Oh!

Script.EP1: じゃあ 今度は 軽く燗(かん)にしましょうか
Meaning.EP1: Shall we go for a hot sake next?

Script.EP1: いいねえ おでんには冷や
Meaning.EP1: That will be nice. Chilled sake for oden and hot sake for this.

Script.EP1: これには燗 うん
Meaning.EP1: Chilled sake for oden and hot sake for this.

Script.EP1: 文句～ あるか
Meaning.EP1: You gotta problem?

Script.EP1: はい
Meaning.EP1: Thanks.

Script.EP1: ちょっと早いけど コクがあってうまい
Meaning.EP1: It may be a bit soon, but it's rich and delicious.

Script.EP1: （美音）そういえば トクさん
Meaning.EP1: By the way Toku…

Script.EP1: （トク）うん？
Meaning.EP1: Huh?

Script.EP1: 憂さ晴らしって 何があったの？
Meaning.EP1: Why do you need to blow off steam?

Script.EP1: ああ 今日の現場
Meaning.EP1: Oh that… A lot happened at work today and we couldn't finish the job.

Script.EP1: いろいろあって終わんなくてな
Meaning.EP1: A lot happened at work today and we couldn't finish the job.

Script.EP1: おやおや トクさんにしては 珍しいんじゃないの 何か どうしたんだい？
Meaning.EP1: That's unusual for you. What happened?

Script.EP1: 手子(てこ)が来なかった
Meaning.EP1: The teko didn't come.

Script.EP1: 手子？
Meaning.EP1: -Oh? -Teko?

Script.EP1: 下働きする助手のことだ
Meaning.EP1: It's what we call an apprentice.

Script.EP1: （トク）うん
Meaning.EP1: Right.

Script.EP1: トクさんの現場だと―
Meaning.EP1: At Toku's workplace,

Script.EP1: 資材を運んだり 道具をそろえたりか？
Meaning.EP1: they do things like carry materials and gather tools, right?

Script.EP1: そうそう そうそう
Meaning.EP1: Yes, that's right.

Script.EP1: 新しく入った弟子が 無断で休みやがった
Meaning.EP1: The new apprentice skipped work without permission.

Script.EP1: （シンゾウ）ほう
Meaning.EP1: -Oh. -Here's your beer.

Script.EP1: 具合が悪かったとか？
Meaning.EP1: Was he sick?

Script.EP1: だったら まだよかったんだがな
Meaning.EP1: I wish that had been the case.

Script.EP1: 嫌んなったって言いやがるんだよ （馨）え？
Meaning.EP1: -He said he was fed up. -What?

Script.EP1: 朝起きて 今日も一日中― 足場の柱や板 運んだりすんのが―
Meaning.EP1: Said he woke up, and just felt fed up with carrying poles and wood all day long.

Script.EP1: もう 急に嫌になったってよ
Meaning.EP1: It came out of nowhere.

Script.EP1: （シンゾウ） それで現場 空けたのかい
Meaning.EP1: -So he skipped work? -Yeah.

Script.EP1: ありかよ そんなの
Meaning.EP1: Hey now, that's not acceptable.

Script.EP1: そんなやつには 見えなかったんだがなあ…
Meaning.EP1: He didn't seem like that kind of kid…

Script.EP1: じゃあ トクさん 今日 大変だったんじゃ？
Meaning.EP1: You must have had a hard day, Toku.

Script.EP1: ああ 現場監督 カンカンだよ
Meaning.EP1: Yeah. The site supervisor was furious.

Script.EP1: いつもの２倍は働いたね
Meaning.EP1: I did double my usual workload.

Script.EP1: ああ だって 明日もよ― 朝イチから クレーム現場をやっつけて―
Meaning.EP1: And tomorrow, I have to deal with a complaint at a construction site,

Script.EP1: そのあとに戸建ての解体もあるしよ
Meaning.EP1: then take down a house site after that.

Script.EP1: （馨）ああ… じゃあ 明日も大変だ
Meaning.EP1: So tomorrow will be tough too!

Script.EP1: 大変なんだよ
Meaning.EP1: It really will be.

Script.EP1: ああ 馨ちゃん もう１本つけて
Meaning.EP1: Kaoru, give me another.

Script.EP1: （美音）トクさん
Meaning.EP1: Toku.

Script.EP1: 明日に響くから 今日はもう締めにしましょ
Meaning.EP1: It'll affect you tomorrow so let's call it a day.

Script.EP1: （シンゾウ）おっ そうか （トク）何だよ… 卵黄のみそ漬け以外にも おまけがあったか
Meaning.EP1: Oh, does that mean the egg yolk misozuke wasn't the only giveaway?

Script.EP1: 大根には葉っぱが付き物ですから
Meaning.EP1: Daikon radish do come with leaves, after all.

Script.EP1: （馨）はい どうぞ
Meaning.EP1: Here you go.

Script.EP1: （トク）ああ 鮮やかだね この緑 うん
Meaning.EP1: Such a brilliant green.

Script.EP1: 元気が湧いてきそうだ
Meaning.EP1: This will give me energy.

Script.EP1: 外は まだ寒いけど― 春は すぐそこまでって感じよね
Meaning.EP1: It's still cold outside but this brings a spring feel, doesn't it?

Script.EP1: 冬の名残のおでんと 春の先駆けの菜めし
Meaning.EP1: Oden ends winter, and rice with greens brings spring.

Script.EP1: こいつは なかなか粋な出会いだね
Meaning.EP1: A rather refined matchmaking.

Script.EP1: うん 言うねえ
Meaning.EP1: Yeah, well said.

Script.EP1: じゃあ 卵黄のみそ漬けは さしずめ―
Meaning.EP1: Then this egg yolk misozuke…

Script.EP1: 出会いを取り持つ― 春満月ってとこだな
Meaning.EP1: is our matchmaker for the full moon of spring.

Script.EP1: いよっ エヘヘヘ （馨）おおっ
Meaning.EP1: -Nice one. -Wow!

Script.EP1: （美音）こんにちは
Meaning.EP1: Hello.

Script.EP1: どうも ありがとうございました またお願いします （女性）はーい
Meaning.EP1: -Thank you, please come again! -Okay!

Script.EP1: こんにちは
Meaning.EP1: Hello.

Script.EP1: （ヒロシ）おお 美音坊 （美音）ああ
Meaning.EP1: -Hey, Mine-bo. -Oh!

Script.EP1: あっ 昨日の大根どうだった？
Meaning.EP1: How was yesterday's daikon radish?

Script.EP1: あっ すっごくおいしかった みずみずしくて
Meaning.EP1: It was really juicy and tasty.

Script.EP1: そうでしょ いいのよ あれ
Meaning.EP1: Right? It's the good stuff.

Script.EP1: 今日はね これよ かき菜
Meaning.EP1: Today's special is kakina.

Script.EP1: わあ おいしそう （ヒロシ）これ いいから 今日
Meaning.EP1: -Looks delicious. -They're great today.

Script.EP1: じゃあ 頂いてこうかな
Meaning.EP1: I'll take it.

Script.EP1: ホント？　持っていこうか あとで
Meaning.EP1: Yeah? I can deliver it.

Script.EP1: ううん 大丈夫 ここで買ってっちゃう （ヒロシ）あっ ホント？ （美音）うん
Meaning.EP1: -It's okay, I'll buy it now. -Okay.

Script.EP1: あと１つぐらいもらおっかな （ヒロシ）じゃあ２つね
Meaning.EP1: I'll have one more. -Two then. -Yup.

Script.EP1: （美音）うん （ヒロシ）はい ありがとう
Meaning.EP1: Thank you.

Script.EP1: （馨）はいはいはい
Meaning.EP1: Here we go.

Meaning.EP1: Ume, here is kakina ohitashi and your usual shochu with hot water.

Script.EP1: はーい
Meaning.EP1: Yes.

Meaning.EP1: I'll put two here. Thank you for this.

Meaning.EP1: This kakina ohitashi is made with wasabi and not karashi mustard.

Script.EP1: そう！　たまには 違う辛さもいいでしょ
Meaning.EP1: Yes! A change in spice is nice, isn't it?

Script.EP1: 私が作ったんだよ
Meaning.EP1: I made it.

Script.EP1: お先っす （ウメ）どうも
Meaning.EP1: -I'm heading out. -Bye now.

Meaning.EP1: Thank you very much. -Please come again. -Okay.

Script.EP1: （美音）いらっしゃい （馨）トクさん

Script.EP1: おっ ウメ婆 来てたか
Meaning.EP1: Ume-ba, you're here.

Script.EP1: 何か いいことあったの？ （トク）え？ （ウメ）ご機嫌だね
Meaning.EP1: Do you have good news? You're in a great mood.

Script.EP1: 今日は来られなかったはずじゃ？

Script.EP1: ああ 連チャンですまねえな （美音）ううん
Meaning.EP1: -Sorry for the trouble. -Not at all.

Meaning.EP1: It went well at work and I wanted to tell you about it.

Script.EP1: （馨）はい 上着 預かる （トク）おう はいはい
Meaning.EP1: -I'll take your jacket. -Thanks.

Script.EP1: 昨日と同じ酒な （美音）はい （トク）あと みそ漬け
Meaning.EP1: -The sake from yesterday and misozuke. -Yes.

Script.EP1: はい
Meaning.EP1: Sure.

Script.EP1: 弟子がよ 朝一番で現場に来たんだよ
Meaning.EP1: My apprentice came to the work site first thing in the morning.

Script.EP1: （馨）え？ あの逃げ出しちゃった人？
Meaning.EP1: -The one that bailed on work? -Yeah.

Script.EP1: そうそう でな
Meaning.EP1: -The one that bailed on work? -Yeah. Bracing for the possibility we'd never be hired again,

Script.EP1: 二度と仕事はもらえない覚悟で―
Meaning.EP1: Bracing for the possibility we'd never be hired again,

Script.EP1: 現場監督のとこ ２人で謝りに行ったんだよ
Meaning.EP1: we went to apologize to the supervisor.

Script.EP1: そしたらよ “二度とあんたらには頼まないって 言いたいところだが―”
Meaning.EP1: And he says, "'I don't want to work with you ever again', is what I want to say,

Script.EP1: “ふだんの仕事は確かだから 今回は大目に見てやる”ってよ
Meaning.EP1: but you always do such a good job so I will let it go this time."

Script.EP1: （馨）ああ よかった （トク）おう
Meaning.EP1: -That's great news. -Yes.

Script.EP1: （馨）でも どういう風の吹き回し？ 昨日はカンカンに 怒ってたんですよね？
Meaning.EP1: But why did he change his mind? He was angry yesterday, right?

Script.EP1: 冷静になって考えたらしいんだな
Meaning.EP1: Apparently he calmed down and thought it over.

Script.EP1: その現場監督もよ 昔はヤンチャで相当荒れてたって
Meaning.EP1: The supervisor said he himself was reckless and a mess as a young man.

Script.EP1: でも 今はちゃんと働いてる
Meaning.EP1: But he's working properly now.

Script.EP1: だから若いやつは長い目で 見てやらないとってな うん
Meaning.EP1: So he said he needs to be patient with young ones, too.

Script.EP1: （美音）よかったですね （トク）おっ おう
Meaning.EP1: I'm glad to hear that.

Script.EP1: じゃあ お弟子さんも おとがめなし？
Meaning.EP1: Is your apprentice off the hook?

Script.EP1: ああ
Meaning.EP1: Nope.

Script.EP1: でも あれだよ ワンペナとかいうやつ？
Meaning.EP1: But, he's got a… What do you call it? A penalty stroke?

Script.EP1: まあ 次に何かやらかしたらな― クビにしてやっからよ あんな野郎
Meaning.EP1: If he does anything again, I'll fire that guy.

Script.EP1: フフフッ で 今日は ちゃんと仕事したの？
Meaning.EP1: Did he work properly today?

Script.EP1: うん いたって普通にね ばっくれる前と同じように
Meaning.EP1: Yeah, just like usual. The same way he did before bailing.

Script.EP1: （馨）えっ？　申し訳なさそうに するとかじゃなくて？
Meaning.EP1: What? He wasn't sorry at all?

Script.EP1: ああ もう 反省してんだか してねえんだか
Meaning.EP1: Well, I don't know if he was sorry or not.

Script.EP1: 今の若いもんってのは まったくな
Meaning.EP1: Oh boy, the young ones these day.

Script.EP1: フフッ ああ
Meaning.EP1: Oh boy, the young ones these day. Yes…

Script.EP1: 今は そういう子が多いみたいだよ （トク）おう
Meaning.EP1: -Apparently they are like that nowadays. -Are they?

Script.EP1: （ウメ）急に嫌になって ほっぽり出して― で また平然と戻ってくるんだと
Meaning.EP1: They suddenly get fed up and walk out then come back like nothing happened.

Script.EP1: （トク）でもよ もう少し すまなそうにしても いいだろうによ （ウメ）ハハハハハ… （トク）ヘヘヘッ
Meaning.EP1: But he could at least act like he's sorry.

Script.EP1: もしかしたら これみたいなものかも
Meaning.EP1: Maybe it's something similar to this.

Script.EP1: （ウメ）うん？
Meaning.EP1: Huh?

Script.EP1: どういうことだよ？
Meaning.EP1: What do you mean?

Script.EP1: このみそ漬け― 卵の黄身を みその中に 入れておくだけなんですけど―
Meaning.EP1: This misozuke is made by simply placing the egg yolk in miso,

Script.EP1: 結構 大変なの
Meaning.EP1: but it's quite difficult.

Script.EP1: 細心の注意を払わないと― おみその中で卵の黄身が 崩れてしまうし―
Meaning.EP1: You have to very careful or the yolk will break in the miso.

Script.EP1: そうなったら みそ床も台なしです
Meaning.EP1: This will ruin the miso bed.

Script.EP1: ああ よく漬かってるね （トク）ああ
Meaning.EP1: -It's well-cured. -Yeah.

Script.EP1: はい 卵黄は扱いづらいけど―
Meaning.EP1: Yes, it is. Egg yolk is difficult to handle.

Script.EP1: しばらく みそ床に入れておけば だんだん固まっていくし―
Meaning.EP1: But if you place it in a miso bed, it will gradually thicken

Script.EP1: よりおいしくなるんですよ
Meaning.EP1: and become even more tasty.

Script.EP1: （トク）いいあんばいに 漬かってるね
Meaning.EP1: It's cured just right.

Script.EP1: （ウメ）おいしい （トク）ん～ うん うまみが凝縮してる うん うん…
Meaning.EP1: Oh, delicious! It's full of umami.

Script.EP1: この まとわりつくような感じが たまんねえなあ
Meaning.EP1: This creamy texture is so good.

Script.EP1: 熟成されて よりおいしくなったんです
Meaning.EP1: It has matured, making it even richer in taste.

Script.EP1: （ウメ）ん～ ああ そっか
Meaning.EP1: Oh, I see.

Script.EP1: 美音坊の言いたいのは そういうこと
Meaning.EP1: Is that what you are implying?

Script.EP1: 扱いづらい若い衆も―
Meaning.EP1: Place young ones who are difficult to handle

Script.EP1: みそ床に入れとけば どうにかなる
Meaning.EP1: in a miso bed and they will turn out okay.

Script.EP1: ウメさん どうにかなるって ちょっと言いすぎよ
Meaning.EP1: Ume. Saying they'll turn out okay is a bit harsh.

Script.EP1: 卵黄は もともと おいしいものだし それに栄養もたっぷりだし
Meaning.EP1: Egg yolk is tasty to start with and is also full of nutrition.

Script.EP1: テヘッ そっか
Meaning.EP1: Silly me, that's right.

Script.EP1: フフッ ただ 卵の黄身を そのまま出して― お金を頂くことは できないでしょうね
Meaning.EP1: But we can't serve egg yolk as it is and expect people to pay for it.

Script.EP1: いくら“ぼったくり”って 名前の店でも― そいつは勘弁してもらいてえな （美音）フフフッ
Meaning.EP1: Even though this place is named Bottakuri, that would be too much of a rip-off.

Script.EP1: なるほどねえ
Meaning.EP1: I see.

Script.EP1: もともと おいしいものを 手を加えて違った味わいにする
Meaning.EP1: You take something that's already tasty, and refine it to make a different flavor.

Script.EP1: それで 客に出せる料理にもなると
Meaning.EP1: Then it will become a dish you can serve to your customers.

Script.EP1: はい
Meaning.EP1: Yes.

Script.EP1: 確かに
Meaning.EP1: That's true.

Script.EP1: 今の若いやつ 育てるってのは― そういうことかもしれねえな
Meaning.EP1: The same may be true when it comes to teaching young people today.

Script.EP1: うまいみそ漬けにするために 時間をかけて見守って―
Meaning.EP1: To make a tasty misozuke you need to take your time and watch over it,

Script.EP1: みそ床まで 気を使ってってことだよな
Meaning.EP1: and take good care of the miso bed as well, right?

Script.EP1: あんた方 親方連中が いいみそ床なら― 黄身も おいしく仕上がるだろうさ （トク）はあ？
Meaning.EP1: If you are a good miso bed as a boss the egg yolk will turn out delicious.

Script.EP1: （馨）塩気がないと つまらなくなるし― ききすぎてても しょっぱくて食べられなくなる
Meaning.EP1: You need salt to taste good but too much will make it too salty to eat.

Script.EP1: 親方さんたちも大変ねえ
Meaning.EP1: Being a boss sure is difficult!

Script.EP1: まっ 鍛えるのは 黄身が固まってからってことな
Meaning.EP1: So I need to wait to temper them until the yolk thickens.

Script.EP1: うっかり黄身を潰して― みそ床まで 台なしにしねえようにしねえとな
Meaning.EP1: I should be careful not to break the yolk so I don't ruin the miso bed either.

Script.EP1: ヘヘヘッ （ウメ）じゃあ―
Meaning.EP1: Well then,

Script.EP1: トクさんの弟子が― おいしい みそ漬けになることを祈って…
Meaning.EP1: shall we toast to Toku's apprentice hopefully becoming delicious misozuke?

Script.EP1: （トク）え？　え？ （馨）フフフ… ウメさん
Meaning.EP1: What? Ume, they are not misozuke.

Meaning.EP1: Ume, they are not misozuke.

Script.EP1: あっと ごめんなさい 間違えた
Meaning.EP1: Oh, so sorry! My mistake.

Script.EP1: みそ漬けじゃなくて 立派な職人さんだ
Meaning.EP1: Not misozuke but a fine workman.

Script.EP1: 頼むよ ウメ婆
Meaning.EP1: Come on, Ume-ba.

Script.EP1: （トク）今日のおすすめは…
Meaning.EP1: What's today's special?

Script.EP1: ワカサギのフライなんて どうですか？ 日本酒にもね 合うと思いますよ
Meaning.EP1: How about deep-fried pond smelt? It will go well with sake.

Script.EP1: （トク）じゃあ これ頼む
Meaning.EP1: I'll have that.

Script.EP1: はい
Meaning.EP1: Yes.

Meaning.EP1: Mine.

Meaning.EP1: We serve food that can be found in any household,

Meaning.EP1: and that in itself makes us a rip-off, a bottakuri.

Meaning.EP1: But Mine, even though they may be common recipes,

Meaning.EP1: cook every single dish with all your heart.

Meaning.EP1: our customers will not regret the money they spend.

Meaning.EP1: But I haven't reached that point yet.
